item.name: Archive a batch of contacts by ID

request.description: Archive a list of contacts given a collection of IDs. This method will return a `204 No Content` response on success regardless of the initial state of the object (e.g. active, already archived, non-existent).

query.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

request.description: Read an Object identified by `{contactId}`. `{contactId}` refers to the internal object ID by default, or optionally any unique property value as specified by the `idProperty` query param.  Control what is returned via the `properties` query param.
Move an Object identified by `{contactId}` to the recycling bin.

Perform a partial update of an Object identified by `{contactId}`. Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will be ignored. Properties values can be cleared by passing an empty string.

query.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.
The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.
